languages.text: {n}Перекошенные лица... Морды. Вонь и брызги слюны из распахнутых ртов. Вытаращенные глаза, сжатые кулаки, вставшие дыбом волосы... Они душат своей массой, давят, требуют, плаксиво жалуются... Они безобразны в своем согрешении. И, как всякий грешник, они желают быть наказанными и тянутся к этому.{/n}

{n}Twisted faces and bestial snouts. Stench and spittle bursting from open mouths. Staring eyes, clenched fists, hair standing on end... They are smothering me with their mass, pressing, demanding, lamenting, complaining... They are ugly in their offence, and like all offenders, they yearn to be punished.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Перекошенные лица... Морды. Вонь и брызги слюны из распахнутых ртов. Вытаращенные глаза, сжатые кулаки, вставшие дыбом волосы... Они душат своей массой, давят, требуют, плаксиво жалуются... Они безобразны в своем согрешении. И, как всякий грешник, они желают быть наказанными и тянутся к этому.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Twisted faces, animal-like snouts. Stench and spittle spurting from open mouths. Staring eyes, clenched fists, hair standing on end... They are smothering me with their mass, pressing, demanding, whining, complaining... They are ugly in their transgression. And like every transgressor, they yearn and desire to be punished.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Verzerrte Gesichter und Tierschnauzen. Gestank und Speichel aus offenen Mündern. Starrende Augen, geballte Fäuste, aufgestellte Haare ... Sie ersticken mich mit ihrer Masse, sie schieben, fordern, lamentieren, klagen ... Sie sind hässlich in ihrer Zudringlichkeit, und wie alle Straftäter sehnen sie sich nach Strafe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Twisted faces and bestial snouts. Stench and spittle bursting from open mouths. Staring eyes, clenched fists, hair standing on end... They are smothering me with their mass, pressing, demanding, lamenting, complaining... They are ugly in their offence, and like all offenders, they yearn to be punished.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Verzerrte Gesichter und Tierschnauzen. Gestank und Speichel aus offenen Mündern. Starrende Augen, geballte Fäuste, aufgestellte Haare ... Sie ersticken mich mit ihrer Masse, sie schieben, fordern, lamentieren, klagen ... Sie sind hässlich in ihrer Zudringlichkeit, und wie alle Straftäter sehnen sie sich nach Strafe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Rostros retorcidos y hocicos animales. El hedor y la saliva escapan de sus bocas abiertas. Miradas fijas, puños apretados, pelo erizado... Me asfixian con su masa, empujando, exigiendo, lamentando, quejándose... Son desagradables en su afrenta, y, como todos los transgresores, anhelan su justo castigo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Twisted faces and bestial snouts. Stench and spittle bursting from open mouths. Staring eyes, clenched fists, hair standing on end... They are smothering me with their mass, pressing, demanding, lamenting, complaining... They are ugly in their offence, and like all offenders, they yearn to be punished.{/n}

Me asfixian con su masa, empujando, exigiendo, lamentando, quejándose... Son desagradables en su afrenta, y, como todos los transgresores, anhelan su justo castigo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}歪んだ顔と獣のような鼻。開いた口からは悪臭と唾液が噴き出す。ギロリとこちらを見る目、握り締められた拳、逆立つ髪…大量に押し寄せ、騒ぎ立て、泣き喚き、文句を吐き出して…見苦しく罪を犯し、他の犯罪者同様、罰を与えてくれと切望している。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Twisted faces and bestial snouts. Stench and spittle bursting from open mouths. Staring eyes, clenched fists, hair standing on end... They are smothering me with their mass, pressing, demanding, lamenting, complaining... They are ugly in their offence, and like all offenders, they yearn to be punished.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}歪んだ顔と獣のような鼻。開いた口からは悪臭と唾液が噴き出す。ギロリとこちらを見る目、握り締められた拳、逆立つ髪…大量に押し寄せ、騒ぎ立て、泣き喚き、文句を吐き出して…見苦しく罪を犯し、他の犯罪者同様、罰を与えてくれと切望している。{/n}

languages.text: {n}我看到了扭曲的面庞和野兽般的鼻子，臭气与唾沫从他们张开的嘴里吐出。他们凝视的目光、紧握的拳头、竖起的头发……这些人的存在让我喘不过气来。催促、要求、哀叹、抱怨……他们犯下罪行的样子无比丑陋。与所有罪犯一样，他们渴望得到惩罚。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Twisted faces and bestial snouts. Stench and spittle bursting from open mouths. Staring eyes, clenched fists, hair standing on end... They are smothering me with their mass, pressing, demanding, lamenting, complaining... They are ugly in their offence, and like all offenders, they yearn to be punished.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}我看到了扭曲的面庞和野兽般的鼻子，臭气与唾沫从他们张开的嘴里吐出。他们凝视的目光、紧握的拳头、竖起的头发……这些人的存在让我喘不过气来。催促、要求、哀叹、抱怨……他们犯下罪行的样子无比丑陋。与所有罪犯一样，他们渴望得到惩罚。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Visages tordus et gueules bestiales. Puanteur et postillons jaillissant de bouches ouvertes. Regards fixes, poings serrés, cheveux dressés sur la tête... Ils m'étouffent de leur masse, me pressent, me sollicitent, se lamentent, se plaignent... Ils sont hideux dans leur transgression, et comme tous les coupables, ils aspirent à être punis.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Twisted faces and bestial snouts. Stench and spittle bursting from open mouths. Staring eyes, clenched fists, hair standing on end... They are smothering me with their mass, pressing, demanding, lamenting, complaining... They are ugly in their offence, and like all offenders, they yearn to be punished.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eğri büğrü yüzler ve yaratıkları andıran burunlar... Açılan ağızlardan saçılan leş gibi kokular ve salyalar... Dik dik bakan gözler, sıkılmış yumruklar, diken diken olmuş tüyler... Cüsseleriyle beni boğuyor, baskı yapıyor, talep yağdırıyor, ağıt yakıyor, şikâyet ediyorlar... Saldırılarında tehlikeliler, tüm saldırganlar gibi onlar da cezalandırılmaya can atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Twisted faces and bestial snouts. Stench and spittle bursting from open mouths. Staring eyes, clenched fists, hair standing on end... They are smothering me with their mass, pressing, demanding, lamenting, complaining... They are ugly in their offence, and like all offenders, they yearn to be punished.{/n}
